articles.title: Trump asks Supreme Court to uphold birthright citizenship restrictions he wants to impose - PBS
articles.description: President Donald Trump's administration is asking the Supreme Court to uphold his birthright citizenship order declaring that children born to parents who are in the United States illegally or temporarily are not American citizens.
articles.content: WASHINGTON (AP)  President Donald Trump’s administration is asking the Supreme Court to uphold his birthright citizenship order declaring that children born to parents who are in the United States il… [+3722 chars]
